Package view.game

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DrawableFrame
    This interface models the actions that can be performed on a frame that supports the rendering of messages.
    GameFrame
    This interface models the visual representation of the game.
    GameOverPanel.GameOverObserver
    This interface indicates the operations that an observer of a GameOverPanel can do.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DrawableFrameImpl
    This class is an implementation of DrawableFrame.
    GameFrameImpl
    A view for the rendering of the main game screen.
    GameOverPanel
    This class handles a JPanel to display at the end of the game.
    GamePanel
    A JPanel for the principal game's rendering.
    StatisticPanel
    A custom JPanel for the rendering of: - the elapsed time - the current score - the statistics of the hero.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DrawableFrame.GameMessage
    The possible messages that can be displayed.
